title: Creative Set Reference
description: Reference to a creative set for use in media buys. Includes authentication for the seller to fetch creatives from the creative agent. Does not include trackers or macro values - those are embedded in the creative tags and expanded by the seller at serve time.

agent_url.description: URL of the creative agent that owns this creative set

creative_set_id.description: Unique identifier for the creative set within the creative agent

authentication.description: Authentication for seller to fetch creatives from the creative agent
